An outstanding abode for a young family or a professional couple Tucked away in a leafy cul-de-sac close to King Street, this stylish residence has all the qualities needed to deliver a great lifestyle for a young family. Its light soaked 132.5sqm design features tastefully updated interiors with spacious dimensions and plenty of classic character that echoes its early 20th century vintage. The home\'s floorplan begins with two generous bedrooms appointed with antique fireplaces and large built-in robes. An extra-wide hall leads to the spacious living room with a third fireplace, followed by a bright gas kitchen with stainless appliances and a dish-drawer. The full-sized bathroom is complemented by plentiful custom storage, and a secluded deck at the rear is an idyllic spot for alfresco enjoyment or keeping an eye on little ones. Polished timber floors, high ceilings and French doors add plenty of style, and there\'s extra storage in the pull-down attic over the hall. A rare offering in a tightly-held neighbourhood, the property is positioned for easy access to an abundance of lifestyle essentials. Schools are nearby, leafy Hollis Park is 300 metres away and it is handy to gourmet cafes as well as weekend farmers markets at Carriageworks. Key amenities like RPA Hospital and Sydney Uni also close by, and it is 600 metres to Macdonaldtown Station.
